page.title: 19Guston Village - Detail (2)
page.content: The churchyard is still used for burials containing an area of unmarked graves for unidentified bodies recovered form the sea. Most recent burial was 17th May 1985. So far this year there have been 3 funerals and 1 wedding. PUBLIC HOUSE :-The 'Chance Inn" belongs to the Whitbread Brewery. Landlord is Mr.Morris. Opening times are 1030-1430 and 1800-2230 (weekdays), and 1200-1400 and 1900-2230 (Sunday). Busiest nights are Fridays and Saturdays. Most customers come from Dover with 6 local village 'regulars'. Serves meals with the most popular :Cod & chips #2.00, Ham,egg & chips#1.70, Double egg & chips #1.00. Lager and whiskey are the most popular drinks. Morning coffee is served and 8 types of draught beer are sold, averaging 80 pence a pint.
